summary: Experienced Staffing Manager and Healthcare Recruiter with a proven track record in sourcing, screening, interviewing, and placing candidates across healthcare and marketing roles. Skilled in workforce planning, client relationships, and recruitment process optimization; strong background in compliance, employee relations, and growth initiatives.

experience.title: Staffing Manager
experience.description: Top branch performer; recruited numerous companies and candidates; expanded client relationships to generate additional job orders; sourced, screened and interviewed candidates; supported client selection processes; maintained ongoing client and temporary staff relationships; resolved issues to ensure high customer satisfaction; built candidate pools to fill short- and long-term assignments; led recruiting plans and business development; organized job recruitment fairs.

experience.title: Healthcare Recruiter
experience.description: Established client relationships and recruiting strategies; onboarded HR compliance training; managed candidate pool and engagement; led recruitment process including assessments, interviews and offers; advised candidates on benefits and salary; provided recruitment guidance to clients; collaborated with outside recruiters; processed personnel action forms; tracked candidates and time-to-fill metrics.

experience.title: Marketing Director
experience.description: Developed and executed marketing plans for orthopedic specialty group; recruited and developed clinical staff; enhanced internal processes and customer relations; expanded network with physicians, clinics and hospitals; grew patient census and revenue; designed marketing materials and managed social media; produced weekly marketing reports and participated in health fairs.

experience.title: Patient Care Services Representative
experience.description: Partnered with local organizations for job opportunities; converted temporary staff to permanent; screened applicants; coordinated new hire orientations; posted positions; developed salary proposals; led recruiting plans; organized recruitment fairs; addressed harassment and employee concerns.

experience.title: Patient Care Services Representative
experience.description: Addressed employee relations issues; conducted exit interviews; supported management in HR policies; hired employees and processed new hire paperwork; explained HR policies and regulations; tracked key dates and deadlines; organized new employee orientations; conducted interviews and coordinated meetings; contributed to recruiting plans.

experience.title: Surgery Coder
experience.description: Tracked deadlines and personnel lists; coordinated meetings; updated HR law information; posted positions; performed salary adjustments; managed contract renewals and promotions; pre-screened resumes and facilitated new employee orientations.

experience.title: Administrative Assistant
experience.description: Led recruiting plans for open positions; developed salary proposals; posted positions; pre-screened resumes; facilitated new employee orientations; supported program activities; tracked candidates and disqualified metrics; contributed to department recruitment efforts.

experience.title: Medical Insurance Specialist/Pain Control Associate
experience.description: Hired employees and processed new hire paperwork; explained HR policies; organized recruitment fairs and orientations; tracked deadlines; led recruiting plans for open positions; salary adjustments and renewals; prepared salary proposals.

experience.title: Medical Insurance Account Representative
experience.description: Coordinated recruitment planning and interviews; created personnel actions; addressed immigration issues; tracked candidates and time-to-fill metrics; led recruiting plans and salary proposals; managed employee records.
